website_summaries.verdict: The BlackBerry Curve 9310 is still the same ho-hum handset you can expect from RIM, but for a no-contract BlackBerry, it's reliable and makes texting a breeze.
pros: The BlackBerry Curve 9310 is contract-free, and has an excellent keyboard and great audio quality
cons: The Curve 9310 sports the same aged look as previous Curve devices, its camera quality is mediocre, and it's missing a lot of key features of BlackBerry 7.1 OS

customer_reviews.title: I love my Blackberry Curve 9310
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I bought this phone. I had a flip phone that was over 10 years old and wanted to transition to an Android type phone next but thought this would be a good stepping stone to get there since I am an older dog who wants to be taught the new tricks gradually:) I love the Blackberry's keyboard and I love the ease of the mouse etc and the only thing I don't like is the battery doesn't last long but I knew this from reading all the other reviews on Amazon so I was already prepared for that and other than the battery, I have no complaints about this phone!
customer_reviews.author: LateApexer313

customer_reviews.title: USED Boost phones are PAINFUL  TO ACTIVATE
customer_reviews.text: Boost Mobile has to deprovision the device from the previous owner before activating it for you and it requires bureaucratic intervention of numerous departments and a few hours on hold with supervisors before an internal process requiring DAYS must complete. Since prepaid phones are usually just abandoned unlike formally closed contract phones, used Boost phones are likely to subject to this hassle and Boost charges an extra $10 to reactivate any used phones. Bucking Foost !
customer_reviews.author: HasAnyoneFoundMyTarantula

customer_reviews.title: Yay blackberry keeps it simple
customer_reviews.text: For used, not bad, happy overall for price. No way would I pay full price even though this is the only phone I ever buy. Great for texting, and pda type functions most of all
customer_reviews.author: als33

customer_reviews.title: Great small phone for a great price!

I really like Blackberry so I decided to stick with it and went with the 9310 and I love it. The camera is great has a flash unlike the 8530 and you have a choice to use it or not and pictures come out great. I haven't had any freezing and the phone/internet are really fast and it has a long battery life. I strongly suggest getting it. Its a great phone.

Will never recommend Boost.

I then realized my Blackberrys have NO SIM CARD! ive been told they're SAMPLE PHONES!! I can't understand how this happend and I demand a reasonable explanation as soon as possible.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade From Blackberry Curve 8530
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone about two weeks ago and so far I'm happy with this purchase. Internet is slightly faster less video buffering Wifi is N capable and camera is better and has flash compared to the 8530. This is nice phone the design is a lot sleeker and operating this phone the commands are almost the same as earlier curve models. battery life is improved but curve 8530 had good battery life as well but 9310 is even better. The phone fell on the floor while i was at work and it is still working can not speak on long term usage of phone but I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mesmerize

customer_reviews.text: This phone is great! I use it with my playbook and my blue tooth device. The phone is fast, I can make conference calls and voice chat on BBM messenger. I can also use the power saver app to reserve the long lasting battery in the phone. I am pleased with this product and its service. I don't have a contract, my bill shrinks from $60 to $35 which includes unlimited talk, text, internet. and caller id, voice mail and up to 10 email accounts. I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: I love BB phones
customer_reviews.text: I have previous experience with BB phones so there was no hesitation to give this on a try. I am pleased to say it more than met my expectations. Easy to operate and setup was a breeze. Wish the back was more secure pops of easily if dropped. That will be remedied with a rubberized cover. Battery life seems to be okay so far it has only been a couple of days so the jury is still out. Overall great phone and would recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Love my BB
customer_reviews.text: Love my BB! I have had this phone for about two years and it's been great. Every now and again you have to pull the battery and that seems to reset whatever is out of sorts. I really use the phone for texting and emails, updating social media. The occasional calls I receive are clear.

product_meta.title: BlackBerry Curve 9310 Prepaid Phone (Boost Mobile)
product_meta.description:
This update to the BlackBerry Curve line features urgrades such as a better 3-megapixel camera, FM radio, and a bigger battery, all in a thinner and sleeker body. The Curve 9310 also features BlackBerry's renowned QWERTY keyboard, Wi-Fi, microSD memory card slot, multi-format music player, and stereo Bluetooth compatibility. This BlackBerry device also features video recording, GPS, and excellent sound quality. 





AMAZON.COM


(view larger) (view larger) The BlackBerry Curve 9310 smartphone gives you the full power of BlackBerry in the familiar Blackberry form factor. Experience messaging made easy with a full QWERTY keyboard and real-time chats to friends anywhere in the world with BBM. You’ll love all the great features like the 3.2MP camera, touch-sensitive optical trackpad, GPS, Wi-Fi and apps.

The BlackBerry 7.1 OS has new features and pre-installed apps. It makes the whole experience fun and easy with fast, rich web browsing, engaging multimedia, social feeds. It also includes voice-activated universal search with Bing Auto Suggest so you can find what you are looking for hands free.

KEY FEATURES
 * OS Version: BB7.1
 * Display 2.44" Transmissive TFT (non-touch)
 * Display Resolution: QVGA 320x240
 * CDMA EVDO Rev0 (3G)
 * 3.2MP Camera + Video Support (video requires mSD)
 * Processor Clockspeed: 800 Mhz 
 * WiFi b/g/n Capable
 * Full QWERTY Keypad with Optical Navigation
 * BlackBerry Messenger 
 * Bluetooth: Version 2.1
 * HAC: T4/M4
 * 

VITAL STATISTICS
The BlackBerry Curve 9310 weighs 3.5 ounces and measures 4.29 x 2.36 x .5 inches. Its 1450 mAh Li-ion battery allows for talk time up to 6 hours.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
BlackBerry Curve 9310 handset, standard battery, 2 piece charger (USB data cable), and getting started guide.






BLACKBERRY MONTHLY UNLIMITED
Get unlimited BlackBerry Messenger, talk & text for just $45/month. Shrink from $45 to as low as $30/month with Shrinking Payments.

Get unlimited talk, text, web, email, and 411 Blackberry messenger for just $60/month. Shrink from $60 to as low as $45/month with Shrinking Payments..

All with no contracts on the Nationwide Sprint Network. 

 * Keep your phone number
 * No contract phone
 * Free activation

WHAT'S INCLUDED
 * Skrinkage - Reduce your monthly payment by up to $15/month.
 * Unlimited Nationwide Talk, Text, Web, and Email - Mobile-to-mobile included.
 * Unlimited Voicemail, Long Distance, Call Waiting, and Call Forwarding.
 * Unlimited 411 Directory Assistance.

ADDITIONAL PLAN SERVICES
 * International Connect - Make unlimited calls around the world.
 * Referral Program - Refer a friend and earn $25 for each one you refer.
feature_bullets: Full QWERTY Keypad with Optical Navigation
Keep in Touch with BlackBerry Messenger (BBM), Text and Email (Yahoo!, Gmail,Hotmail)
Speedy Web Browsing with BlackBerry 7 OS
Browse Thousands of Apps & Games in BlackBerry App World
